    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerBootstrap

        protected ServerBootstrap(InjectConfiguration early,
                          InjectConfiguration late)
        Instantiates Selene, creating a local injector based on the provided InjectConfiguration. Also verifies dependency artifacts and injector bindings. Proceeds to SeleneBootstrap.construct() once verified.
        Parameters:
        early - the injector provided by the Selene implementation to create in pre-construct phase
        late - the injector provided by the Selene implementation to create in construct phase

    • Method Detail

      • debugRegisteredInstances

        public void debugRegisteredInstances(ServerStartedEvent event)
        Prints information about registered instances. This includes injection bindings, modules, and event handlers. This method is typically only used when starting the server.
        Parameters:
        event - The server event indicating the server started
